## Xbox Game Pass – What is it?

Xbox Game Pass is a subscription service that offers hundreds of [Xbox
One](https://www.trustedreviews.com/xbox-one-review) and Xbox 360 titles for a
monthly fee. The service allow players to download an extensive library of
games to their Xbox One. There’s also a free trial if you fancy trying things
out first.

But what is Xbox Game Pass? _Trusted Reviews_ has put together everything you
need to know all in one place including the price, games and more.

## Xbox Game Pass Price: How much is it?

The service currently costs £7.99/$9.99 per month, with subscribers having the
ability to purchase select games and downloadable content at a special
discount. Oh, and you don’t need an Xbox Live Gold Membership.

## Xbox Game Pass: How do I use it?

As long as you maintain an active Game Pass subscription you can access
downloaded titles the same way you’d find anything else on Xbox One. Just head
on over to ‘My Games and Apps’ and everything will be ready to play.

## Xbox Game Pass Games: What can I play?

Xbox Game Pass includes a selection of Xbox One and Xbox 360 games that are
constantly being expanded by Microsoft. Each month will see several new
additions spanning both platforms.

Microsoft also recently announced that all of its [major
exclusives](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/xbox-game-pass-update-
microsoft-games-launch-free-3381416) will be available on Game Pass upon their
release. This is huge news, meaning the entirety of the console’s exclusive
library is playable for a fraction of the cost. This will include [Sea of
Thieves](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sea-of-thieves), [Crackdown
3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/crackdown-3), [State of Decay
2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/state-of-decay-2-release-date-gameplay-
multiplayer-coop-trailer-xbox-one-pc-2949448) and more! This new addition also
applies to Xbox Play Anywhere, so you’ll have access to them on PC, too.
